attributes.action: include powerboat racing in the 2012 olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I among many others have little interest in the sports that make up the olympic games. I feel we need to have something faster paced and more of a spectacle.
We as a nation have had great success over the years in inshore circuit racing with little or no recognition to our drivers.
It is possible without much effort to hold the racing at the same course as the rowing is held, I myself have raced on the Holme Peirpoint rowing course.
It would make a great event and would generate the publicity that i feel this exciting sport needs
